label: Jaschhof, Mathias & Catrin Jaschhof.  2014. Zadbimyia, a new genus of asynaptine Porricondylinae (Diptera: Cecidomyiidae) with twenty-two new species from the cloud forest of Costa Rica. Zootaxa 3866(1): 1–29.
